title: Adaptive Nocturnal Knowledge Retrieval for Financial Research Agents
abstract: We present a hybrid retrieval pipeline that fuses capital markets datasets with language-model planning, outperforming baseline screeners on post-close filings.

title: Vector-Driven Corpora for SEC Filing Summarization
abstract: We benchmark embedding-based search strategies for high-frequency SEC filings and introduce a reference implementation for production ingestion pipelines.

title: Caching Strategies for Real-Time Research Assistants
abstract: We evaluate cache invalidation policies that reduce end-to-end latency for research question answering systems operating on financial corpora.
